# uptimekuma_notification_alertnow (Resource)

AlertNow notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_alertnow" "example" {
  name        = "AlertNow Notifications"
  webhook_url = "https://alertnow.example.com/webhook/your-token"
  is_active   = true
  is_default  = false
}

resource "uptimekuma_notification_alertnow" "backup" {
  name        = "AlertNow Backup"
  webhook_url = "https://alertnow.example.com/webhook/backup-token"
  is_active   = true
  is_default  = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Notification name
- `webhook_url` (String, Sensitive) AlertNow webhook URL

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
